title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore          Shop a limited selection of items online here.   The park's bookstore is operated by Eastern National, a cooperating association of the National Park Service. Eastern National offers books and other educational items relating to the interpretive themes of Carl Sandburg Home NHS. The store is located on the first floor of the historic Sandburg Home. A percentage of the proceeds from all sales are donated to the interpretive program of Carl Sandburg Home NHS. To contact the park bookstore, call 828-698-5621.
